entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
